name: Sandwich Hero
description:
Sandwich Hero is a yummy little game where you launch a slice of bread out of a toaster, controlling it's flight to catch ingredients to make one big, delicious sandwich! Tilt your device left and right to guide the airborne bread towards the toppings as it ascends, and towards the condiments as it descends onto your plate.

Sandwich Hero began as a Jam game for TOJam11: Don't Stop Beleven.
